title: "find my phone" not working. Phone lost in a public space, is there another way to erase it?
content: I left my phone on top of a taxi a few days ago, whilst distracted by my daughter. The "find my phone" option is saying "Can't connect", so I am unable to find its location or erase it. May I ask if there is another way to do this? I scoured the local area. The taxi driver states it is not where I thought it was, in his trunk. The phone is still ringing - it was on 50% battery when I lost it and it has been four days, so maybe someone has it plugged in.
